resources.string:
2 eggs
Salt and pepper
Butter or oil for cooking
Instructions:
Crack two eggs into a bowl and beat them with a fork.
Season the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper.
Heat a small non-stick pan over medium heat.
Add a small knob of butter or a drizzle of oil to the pan.
Once the butter has melted or the oil is hot, pour in the beaten eggs.
Use a spatula to stir the eggs gently as they cook, until they are scrambled to your liking.
Serve hot and enjoy!
